posts.post_content:

Pickering SGC A (hammered) piedmont
Barry SGC A (presents well) piedmont
Kruger SGC 10 sweet cap.
Casey SGC 10 piedmont
Phelps SGC 10 sweet cap.
Wright SGC 20 piedmont 
Schlafly SGC 10 polar bear
Killian SGC A (eraser) sweet cap.
Dorner BVG 1 piedmont 
Seymour GAI 1 (portrait) piedmont 

Low-grade lot, not going to do scans. I am willing to listen to best offers for the lot. $5 for shipping includes insurance and delivery confirmation. Feel free to email me at [url]rheffner79@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks 
Ryan H.

Feel free to make an offer. Would like to move in the next day or two. Check or Postal Money order please.

Thanks 

Ryan H.

I will put a price $150 for the 10 cards. Or throw me an offer.

Check or Postal MO

Thanks
Ryan Heffner
